keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secure the future of our NHS and tackle the huge funding problems created by the Tories and Lib Dems at King's College Hospital
Oppose the Tories’ hard Brexit on behalf of residents from across the constituency, who voted overwhelmingly for Remain
Stop the Tories’ damaging plans for huge funding cuts to every school in our area - almost £1,000 per pupil
Build the genuinely affordable homes to rent and buy that we need and ensure a fair deal for private renters
Tackle air pollution in London and across the UK and make Britain a world leader on climate change once again

issues.brexitEurope: Oppose the Tories’ hard Brexit on behalf of residents from across the constituency, who voted overwhelmingly for Remain
issues.education: Stop the Tories’ damaging plans for huge funding cuts to every school in our area - almost £1,000 per pupil
issues.environment: Tackle air pollution in London and across the UK and make Britain a world leader on climate change once again
issues.health: Secure the future of our NHS and tackle the huge funding problems created by the Tories and Lib Dems at King's College Hospital

housing.content: Build the genuinely affordable homes to rent and buy that we need and ensure a fair deal for private renters

images.caption: Helen Hayes, Labour candidate for Dulwich and West Norwood
